item.description:
Peacemakers Unite! for this UN Day of Peace Event...

FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 21 IS THE UNITED NATIONS DAY OF PEACE

Join us at the Center of Light Boston for a peaceful gathering in support of this international day of ceasefire and non-violence.
7-9 pm, 200 Amory Street, Jamaica Plain

Refreshments
Interfaith Prayers for World Peace
Peace Initiative Exhibits

For more information call Rev Mary Francis at 978-808-2330
item.name: UN Day of Peace
